justification: Candidate has project management experience in telecommunications but lacks specific automation or control systems experience.
Extensive leadership roles with teams in regional and international contexts.
Limited direct technical experience with DCS/PLC systems mentioned in JD.
No evident experience or proficiency in HMI development or specific data analysis tools like Excel or Power BI.
Candidate attended BUITEMS, which may not be considered a top-tier university.
Does not meet the minimum 5+ years of experience in automation and control systems required by JD.

requirements.criteria: Experience in project management and team leadership
5+ years of experience in automation and control systems
Proficiency in DCS/PLC programming and HMI development

input.job_description:
## Join Prestige Automations as Robotics & Automation Engineer!

### Overview
Prestige Automations is seeking a highly skilled Robotics & Automation Engineer to join our cutting-edge engineering team. The ideal candidate will leverage their expertise in control systems to integrate and innovate within the Oil and Gas sectors. Embrace the opportunity to work across multiple geographical locations and lead projects crafting efficient, reliable systems that push industry standards.

### Key Responsibilities
- Develop, program, and test DCS/PLC systems, refining designs for maximum efficiency.
- Lead projects focusing on pre-commissioning and commissioning, ensuring robust integration with existing infrastructure.
- Design and evaluate control system architectures, including hardware and software components.
- Collaborate closely with cross-functional teams to ensure optimal project planning and resource management.
- Prepare detailed project documentation to support project outcomes and client specifications.

### Core Competencies
- Expertise in control system programming (PLC/DCS, HMI) and development.
- Strong analytical skills with proficiency in data analysis tools such as Power BI and Excel.
- Proven leadership skills with the ability to manage complex projects and teams across multiple disciplines.
- Excellence in customer communication to ensure effective system implementation and support.

### Why Join Us?
At Prestige Automations, we are not just innovating technology; we are redefining the possibilities in automation. Our culture of continuous learning and improvement aims to foster personal growth and professional development in a supportive and inclusive environment.
input.additional_info: Preferred candidates have degrees from top universities such as MIT or Stanford. Prestige Automations supports relocation for international candidates with relevant experience, offering competitive relocation packages. Skill assessments are conducted through technical interviews and simulations to gauge hands-on abilities and problem-solving skills.
minimum_requirements: Experience in project management and team leadership
5+ years of experience in automation and control systems
Proficiency in DCS/PLC programming and HMI development

details.executive_summary: Saeed Iqbal is a skilled Wireless Integration Engineer with extensive experience in telecommunications, specializing in wireless services and integration across multiple generations of mobile technology. He has a strong technical background in managing complex projects and ensuring operational excellence.

employment_history.details: Responsibilities include providing remote delivery of wireless services, conducting pre-checks and post-checks for site integration, and preparing scripts using various tools.
Supervised operations to ensure compliance with customer specifications, troubleshooting technical issues, and managing project schedules.
Managed operations and maintenance for telecommunication networks, including installation and commissioning of cellular network equipment.
Coordinated field operations and managed installation of Huawei equipment, ensuring network availability and performance.
Involved in installation and commissioning of Huawei BTS and transmission nodes, performing site audits and maintenance.
Installed and commissioned Huawei BTS and transmission nodes, conducting various tests and documentation.
